notes.val: S is the set of all rational numbers whose numerators are between  and  inclusive, and whose denominators are between  and  inclusive.

definition.definitionVal: int howMany(int w, int x, int y, int z)

examples.note: Only the value 1/1 is being considered.
Here the values are 1/1, 1/2, 2/1, and 2/2. Since 2/2 = 1/1 the answer is 3.

constraints.val: x and z will be between 1 and 100, inclusive.
w will be between 1 and x, inclusive.
y will be between 1 and z, inclusive.
